text: Remy Hii (born 24 July 1986) is an Australian actor. In 2013, he starred as Van Tuong Nguyen in the four-part miniseries Better Man and as Hudson Walsh in the soap opera Neighbours. Other television appearances include Marco Polo, Harrow and Sisters. He appeared in the movies Crazy Rich Asians (2018) and Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019). Hii was born in Malaysia. His father is Chinese-Malaysian and his British mother is from Manchester. He grew up in Papua New Guinea and Queensland. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Queensland Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Australian television actors
title: Remy Hii
